title: Grants cities authority to review plans for the construction of structures proposed to be made within its boundaries
summary: Grants cities authority to review plans for the construction of structures proposed to be made within its boundaries.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          389

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by Sens. KRUEGER, DIAZ, DILAN, HASSELL-THOMPSON -- read twice
         and ordered printed, and when printed to be committed to the Committee
         on Cities

       AN  ACT  to  amend  the  general  city law, in relation to the review of
         construction plans by cities

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Section 20 of the general city law is amended by adding a
    2  new subdivision 39 to read as follows:
    3    39. TO REVIEW PLANS FOR CONSTRUCTION OR RECONSTRUCTION OF  ANY  STRUC-
    4  TURE  PROPOSED  TO BE MADE WITHIN ITS BOUNDARIES FOR COMPLIANCE WITH ANY
    5  CODES, RULES OR REGULATIONS. NOTWITHSTANDING ANY OTHER PROVISION OF LAW,
    6  NO CITY SHALL BE PERMITTED TO  ACCEPT  CERTIFICATION  OF  DOCUMENTS  FOR
    7  CONSTRUCTION  OF NEW BUILDINGS FROM ARCHITECTS OR ENGINEERS AS A SUBSTI-
    8  TUTE FOR REVIEW AND APPROVAL OF SUCH PLANS BY EMPLOYEES OF THE CITY.
    9    S 2. This act shall take effect July 1, 2012.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD00867-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general city law, in relation to the review of construction plans by cities
